name: Killer S.p.a.
description:
Play as a professional killer in a world infested by zombies.

The first rule to be a professional assassin is to kill only your target and in this rule has no less value after the zombie apocalypse. Find your target and kill it before the horde kills you.

This project was created in 48 hour for GMTK 2019 Game Jam. The theme was "Only One" so we thought a zombie game were you are allowed to kill only one zombie would be fun,we hope you can enjoy it too.
Due to time limit many of the features planed didn't make it into the game, We'll try to keep it updated and implement some more features in the future.

Buona partita!
